author: nhcwebmaster@noaa.gov (NHC Webmaster)
nhc_headline: ...CHANTAL MOVING ACROSS SOUTHERN AND EASTERN VIRGINIA... ...FLASH FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES NEAR AND NORTHEAST OF THE CENTER...
summary: ...CHANTAL MOVING ACROSS SOUTHERN AND EASTERN VIRGINIA... ...FLASH FLOOD THREAT CONTINUES NEAR AND NORTHEAST OF THE CENTER... As of 09:00 UTC MON JUL 07 2025 the center of Chantal was located near 36.8, -78.1 with movement NE at 15 mph. The minimum central pressure was 1009 mb with maximum sustained winds of about 30 mph.

title: Summary - Tropical Depression Chantal (AT3/AL032025)
